titles.title: A resolution congratulating Southern Illinois University Edwardsville as it celebrates its 50th anniversary.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/24/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates Southern Illinois University Edwardsville (SIUE) on its 50th anniversary. Wishes SIUE success in its continued service to the Nation as a center of educational advancement in Southern Illinois.
